title: Staying Human in the AI Age: Finding Purpose with Seekive
author: Seekive
content: Artificial Intelligence is reshaping everything — how we work, learn, create, and even think. For the first time in history, many people are facing a future where machines can do nearly everything they once did.

AI promises freedom, but it also stirs an ancient fear: If machines take over the doing, what happens to the meaning? Seekive was created to help answer that — by giving purpose, direction, and discovery back to people in a world where the boundaries between human and machine are shifting fast.
